forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 2pm. Mostly sunny. High near 91, with temperatures falling to around 88 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 2 to 7 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely between 8pm and 2am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 2am and 5am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 69. West southwest wind 2 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
